body:
Hi,

We are looking to extend our group in Stockholm with one more person. If someone is interested, check the add:

[https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/243950905/?trk=jobs_biz_prem_srch](https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/243950905/?trk=jobs_biz_prem_srch)

Regards,

Alejandro
topic: Digital Sustainable designer job in Stockholm

replies.body:
Hello. Do you provide internship positition for student?



Thanks.
Hi Alejandro. Thanks for posting. I re-posted the link on Ladybug's Facebook and twitter accounts.
